# GetTerminalType

**Instance Method**

Gets the terminal type of the stream.

## Declaration

```swift
IOUserAudioStreamTerminalType GetTerminalType();
```

## Return Value

The stream’s terminal type.

## Discussion

This method synchronizes by using the work queue created by the object.

## Working with Stream Terminals

- **SetTerminalType**: Sets the terminal type of the stream.
- **IOUserAudioStreamTerminalType**: Constants that describe the terminal type of an audio stream.
